section.name: log4j version 1.1.3
section.h2: Join our campaign to influence the JSR47 API.
section.p: Download version 1.1.3 including full source code, class files and documentation in TAR.GZ format or in ZIP format. You may elect to browse log4j documentation online.
Version 1.1.3 is the 21st major public release of log4j. It is backward compatible with log4j version 1.0.x.
We also maintain a list of earlier versions of log4j for download, intended for the curious paleontologist.

section.name: Third-party software

dl.dd: A library of C++ classes for flexible logging to files, syslog, IDSA and other destinations modeled after log4j by Bastiaan Bakker.
A Python translation of log4j by Igor Poteryaev.
A custom log tag from the Jakarta Taglibs project.
Yet another tag library designed to give JSP tag-level access to log4j.
A visual log4j configuration file editor by Tobias Dezulian.
A log4j wrapper for JINI Jerome Bernard.

section.p: If you would like your software to be listed here, then send a note to the log4j-user@jakarta.apache.org list.
